description: <p><span id="product_description" itemprop="description">Silicone Can Lid 2 Pack (Various Colors)<br></span><span id="product_description" itemprop="description"><br>YVH can lid is silicone and food-safe to perfectly preserve hops after you crack into your hop can. Reusable, sealable, and easy to use. As an extra layer of protection, fill can with inert gas like CO2 or a wine preserver before sealing.</span></p>

description:
<h2>New Zealand Waimea‚Ñ¢ HOP PROFILE |</h2>
<span id="product_description" itemprop="description">Waimea‚Ñ¢ is a dual purpose hop that is well-suited for big, heavy-handed brews. It was developed by The New Zealand Institute for Plant &amp; Food Research and boasts big Alpha Acids (16 - 19%). Because of the high Alpha Acids, <a href="http://www.yakimavalleyhops.com/NZWaimea16oz_p/hopsnzwaimea1-2015crop.htm" data-cke-saved-href="http://www.yakimavalleyhops.com/NZWaimea16oz_p/hopsnzwaimea1-2015crop.htm" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Waimea</a> works well as a bittering hop for big IPAs. Waimea's aroma and flavor is a pleasant balance of fresh citrus and resinous pine. Aromas of tangerine, grapefruit, and pomelo can be achieved through dry-hopping and whirlpool additions. <br><br>Alpha Acids: 16-19%<br></span><span id="product_description" itemprop="description"></span><span id="product_description" itemprop="description"></span><span id="product_description" itemprop="description"><a href="http://hillfarmstead.com/single-hop-series/motueka-single-hop-pale-ale.html" target="_blank" style="text-size-adjust: 100%; color: #2baadf; font-family: Helvetica;" rel="noopener noreferrer"><br></a></span><span style="font-family: Montserrat, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"></span><span id="product_description" itemprop="description"></span>
